title: Hi, I'm David
subtitle: Systems & Data Analyst
availabilityText: Open to Information Systems/Systems Analyst roles
introText: Systems & Data Analyst with a Master's degree in Computer Science and 9+ years supporting academic IT environments, data-driven operations, and enterprise-style reporting workflows. Experienced in system analysis, data process improvement, and operational reliability across Windows and Linux platforms. Hands-on experimentation in a personal home lab with enterprise switching equipment, VLAN configuration, IP addressing, and isolated test environments.
